org.buildmlearn.practicehandwriting.helper

Class CalculateFreehandScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,float[]>
      • org.buildmlearn.practicehandwriting.helper.CalculateFreehandScore

  • public class CalculateFreehandScore
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,float[]>
    Helper class to calculate the score of a freehand trace in the background using AsyncTask
